Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Binary variable: 1 if worker (w) is assigned to task (tsk), 0 otherwise.

Name: assign_user_story_to_sprint
Description: Binary variable: 1 if user story (us) is assigned to sprint (sp), 0 otherwise.

Name: assign_feature_to_release
Description: Binary variable: 1 if feature (f) is included in release plan (rep), 0 otherwise.

Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Binary variable: 1 if worker (w) is a member of team (t), 0 otherwise.

Name: set_sprint_for_task
Description: Integer variable defining the sprint number (sp) in which a task (tsk) is scheduled.

Name: determine_team_size
Description: Integer variable representing the number of workers in a team (t).

Name: worker_allocation_percentage
Description: Continuous variable for the percentage of a worker's (w) availability allocated to a project (p).

Name: set_user_story_priority
Description: Integer variable to determine the priority ranking of a user story (us) in the product backlog.

Name: start_date_of_sprint
Description: Date variable representing the calculated start date for a specific sprint (sp).

Name: select_worker_for_role
Description: Binary variable: 1 if worker (w) is selected for a specific role (r), 0 otherwise.

Name: number_of_workers_on_team
Description: Integer variable determining the total number of workers assigned to a specific team (t).
